note.p: Career: MP for Wareham (1774); MP for Tamworth (1774-1780); MP for Lostwiethiel (1780-1781); Groom of the Bedchamber (1775); Commissioner for Trade and Plantations (1777-1781); Vice Treasurer of Ireland (1784); Joint Postmaster General (1787-1794); Comptroller of the First Fruits and Tenths; Privy Councillor; Chairman of the Committee of Privileges, House of Lords (1794-1814)
